title: Pet Rescue Saga v1.60.3 mods
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully. Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Pet Rescue Saga features:
â€¢ Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay 
â€¢ Lovable pets of all varieties, puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more! 
â€¢ Diamonds, exploding bombs, colorful paint pots, locked animal cages and much more 
â€¢ Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels 
â€¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
â€¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
â€¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
â€¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Whatâ€™s new:
Happy New Year! The Pets are back with a fabulous update for you! It includes:
- A brand new episode, â€˜Ice Cream Streamsâ€™! The Pets have been attracted by the sweet smell coming from 'Ice Cream Streams'... The narwhal living here has a very sweet tooth! With 15 NEW LEVELS, there are now 1212 levels of fun!
- New Mystery Mountain adventures! Will you make it to the top?
Fun fact! Sinbad the cat is very fond of ice-skating.

Mod1:
- Normal moves.
- Unlimited lives.
- Unlimited boosters (u need to have at least one).
- All levels Unlocked.
- All episodes Unlocked.
- All world Unlocked.

Mod2:
- 100 moves.
- Unlimited lives.
- Unlimited boosters (u need to have at least one).
- All levels Unlocked.
- All episodes Unlocked.
- All world Unlocked.

The mod will not work if it is installed on a google version.
Requires Android: 2.3+
